title: Urf the Manatee re-release?
body: Will Urf the Manatee finally come back along with the release of the new Warwick?

replies.body: Probkably but onlys if you hbuy a bundle of all skins because riot is EVIL

As Niji mentioned, probably in the bundle (of those I remember this was the case with Poppy and Twitch's limited skins) but very unlikely they will be for individual sale.

Warwick has a lot of sub 975 skins though so the bundle may not be all that expensive. I've gotten a lot of his skins via mystery gift so I don't imagine the bundle will cost all that much for me. The one I want is Tundra Hunter though so probs won't bother with the bundle.

I would doubt it, bringing back special skins is not something Riot likes doing, because of their commitment to the original owners.
Grey WW is also a special skin that I would consider unlikely that they bring back. _(I think they should bring both back, but i don't really get a say in the matter.)_

But I really hope they do, I've been after that Urf skin since the first day I was aware of it.
